plot: Dima, a petty criminal, is going to be deported from Germany. Meeting young student Sarah who is working on a documentary about young foreigners.He becomes the main subject of the film. Soon enough, Dima and Sarah get emotionally tied up.
title: Fliegen
plot_es: Dima, a petty criminal, is going to be deported from Germany. Meeting young student Sarah who is working on a documentary about young foreigners.He becomes the main subject of the film. Soon enough, Dima and Sarah get emotionally tied up.
plot_en: Dima, a petty criminal, is going to be deported from Germany. Meeting young student Sarah who is working on a documentary about young foreigners.He becomes the main subject of the film. Soon enough, Dima and Sarah get emotionally tied up.
